Blog.post: Sana po hindi ako tuwang tuwa... hehe btw just came from my dentist and finally declared bankrupcy... maka 2000 ba naman ako sa kakapagawa ng ngipin? wala na nga ako pera e... gonna keep this short mag-aaral pa e. don't forget to watch nginiig later 5pm byee sheena

haha just flunked botany again! heehee... wonderin' about a possible way to pass my course. btw just played softball this afternoon... it was cool really! just ran after a muddy ball, tripped over an opponent and almost performed a gymnastic performance protecting my base... geesh! just been talking to my friend lena... they'd be our next opponent... be ready! go lemon squares! also, just realized it was funner to play umpire than to bat a ball. gegege... thnx to allen for the 'blog' influence u got me to! also doing my tickle quiz at the moment so i think i'd keep thi short na! tata! madami pa rin akong mga kadamuhan na aaralin!

Well just finished downloading a few vids and interviews... haha! u should see nicky... he got his other ear pierced and i love it! harhar... goodbye eirik, nicko and bryan are back... geesh when could i learn how to be realistic... stop all these dreaming man! gegege tata!

Just watched Brian McFadden's new single and i think he does make good music alone. great voice and accompaniment more rocky and less teeny boppy in style hee hee. less of the boyband kind of thing. more of the rocky side then! well listen to it when u get a chance btw, this is me in bot lab a few minutes before we get to drawing all those grasses again. behind me is a ghost... hehe joke! that's my korean friend eun a. she's like a college best if u know what i mean... just an update of what i'm up to... well one thing's i'm back in meditation and self training for reviewing flashbacks and absorbing stuffs like feelings and the like. just saw this vision of a dead man in our bathroom but then the place was still different. trying to orient what i saw i tried looking at some other places in the house. in my lola's room my vision was of a carabao drove by a man (erm tama ba un??) with the same dead person being pulled at the back. i stopped before i got all spooked to sleep anyway.. to be continued!
allen, thnx sa comment ulet! parang d ka makapaniwala na nagpapakawriter na ko ha... seryosohin m ung poem ko, kaso parang d m nman bnasa
wala lang talaga! heehee btw that's my sister auddey! not gf! puh-lease... if u've even thought about it, get a life out of the green

Can't breath, can't see Hands shaking on a cup of tea Bowed down, can't face Ashamed of mistakes, avoidance of disgrace You try but you fail You always end up before everyone's tail You're smart some say But others still can't understand how you play Mom gives a pat of recognition Dad, a word of expectation Building up, it gives too much pressure All in all, a mind wrecking torture I try and pray, but end up empty I strive and want but still stop at pity I want to live the way they want me But still end up flunked because of stupidity To squeeze the eyes shut to stop the tears You try to share but you have stone peers Anger builds up in the tightness of your fist But your smile is still up, mind lost in the abyss No one knows None will also listen Even if you close your eyes, count to ten' You'll stil live a life that was never really lighten urgh... i'm a useless ass

Sana po hindi ako tuwang tuwa... hehe btw just came from my dentist and finally declared bankrupcy... maka 2000 ba naman ako sa kakapagawa ng ngipin? wala na nga ako pera e... gonna keep this short mag-aaral pa e. don't forget to watch nginiig later 5pm byee sheena
